channel.title: DNS Record :: Internship Report
channel.description: PHASE 5: POINT OFFICIAL DOMAIN (DNS RECORD) Go to Route 53 > Hosted zones > sgutodolist.com. Create Record for Root domain: Click Create record. Record name: (leave blank). Type: A. Alias: Yes (Swipe the button to the right). Route traffic to: Alias ​​to CloudFront distribution. Choose distribution: Select the CloudFront domain (e.g. d123...cloudfront.net). Click Create records.
